attributes.action: allow the supermarkets to continue with offers when selling alcohol.  Why should the majority of decent law abiding citizens be penalised?  What happened to a free society?  We do not want another 'nanny' state directive!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people enjoy a drink in their own home which they buy at the supermarkets.  It is a small treat for many people maybe at the end of the day or week when they have been working hard.  Many people will be on tight budgets maybe earning the minimum wage or not much more.  Why shouldn't they benefit from some supermarket offers now and again.Most people do not commit a crime because they have had a drink whether it be at home or socially in public.  Why should the law abiding majority be penalised for a few.
